pageContext.claim: “52 percent. Oh, the women liked me, you know. They liked me. They liked me. … And we did great with the women. In fact, I remember, again, on election night they said, 'How the hell did this happen?' Remember, they were giving you phony numbers on that, too.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is citing the exit-poll results only for white women, in which he got 52 percent. But for all women, exits polls show he received only 41 percent. Clinton received the votes of 54 percent of all women.
